description: The lily of the Incas, Alstroemeria 'Koice' INCA ICE, is a stunningly beautiful flower. It produces clusters of white, cream, and pink blooms that are reminiscent of a fragrant summer meadow. The long-lasting, showy blossoms are perfect for a bouquet or display in the garden. Plus, the fern-like foliage is both attractive and easy to care for. Furthermore, this hardy little plant can tolerate heat, drought, and poor soils. Written up, this is an amazing variety of flower worth adding to any garden.
